useCase.name: Deploy Service
useCase.description: Deploy a cloudlet service using the CLI and Web interface.

preconditions.precondition: The user has access to the cloudlet service deployment tools.

successEndConditions.condition: The cloudlet service is successfully deployed.

mainSequence.step: The actor requests the deployment of a cloudlet service using the CLI.
The CLI sends a request to deploy the service to the cloudlet.
The actor requests the deployment of a cloudlet service using the Web interface.
The Web interface sends a request to deploy the service to the cloudlet.
